mapper.select: SELECT products.brand AS brand, specification AS specification, price_level AS priceLevel, regions.affiliated_region AS region, customer_orders.sales_channel AS salesChannel, customer_orders.order_quantity AS orderQuantity, order_satisfaction_config.customer_category AS customerCategory FROM products join customer_orders on products.id = customer_orders.product_id join regions on customer_orders.region_id = regions.id join order_satisfaction_config on customer_orders.order_satisfaction_config_id = order_satisfaction_config.id WHERE products.brand = #{brand}
